programme.desc: Felix blackmails Walter in order to get closer to Mitchell. There could be light at the end of the tunnel for Sienna. And Brody has a decision to make.

programme.desc: Scott is surprised when Walter asks him for help. Liberty wonders where her future lies. Sid is looking forward to some alone time with Juliet, but she has other ideas...
